item.title: About Mike
item.description: Fun facts Favorite book: Where the Wild Things Are Favorite beer: Bodhizafa IPA Once was chased by a moose in Alaska. Do not recommend. Career import json with open('resume.json') as f: resume = json.load(f) for (age, exp) in zip(range(21, 37, 3), resume): state, job = exp.get('state'), exp.get('job') print(f'{age} -> {state} | {job}') >>> 21 -> IL | Music Major >>> 24 -> GA | Project Manager >>> 27 -> WA | Business Analyst >>> 30 -> WA | Solution Architect >>> 33 -> WA | Senior Data Analyst >>> 36 -> ?

item.title: Projects
item.description: Recipes whatsfordinner.recipes Based on Recipes by jeffThompson and modifications by kvpsky. It is a static website, hosted by Netlify in my case, with my favorite recipes and some editorial notes. Helpful for last minute dinner planning. Python Workout https://github.com/joeeoj/python-workout Daily (mostly) solutions to the 50-ish problems in Reuven Lerner’s Python Workout book. I have an intermediate knowledge of Python but this continues to teach me interesting techniques and has stretched me to get better at writing tests and fully embrace type hints.
